name: Breakout (itch) (psybergames)
description: This is officially my first demo and Would appriciate if guys and gals could download and try and let me know what you think. Atm no instruction page so this is how the game is played. W = walk forward S = walk Back Mouse pointer controls rotation of player. A = strafe left D = strafe right The year is 2041 somewhere in the near future, prison have been hiring freelance security runners to maintain the prison security and make sure it is all running smooth as a babies bum. twist and turn, run and dodge as you try to get past the security system and reach the end. Two of the biggest killers is the security drones and the guards that aren't friendly at all wether your helping them or not. And watch out for those sewer pipes pumping out red hot steam from the laundery. So without further a do I present to you Breakout !
